line.comment: * Check if our team is spotted.

line.text: 'Your team managed to pass through the enemies without being noticed.'

line.comment: * If the team is spotted, we set each enemy distance to they preferred range, and we make them shoot all at once.
* Fight until all enemies or all marines are dead.
* @param $enemy - also with all $enemyX info from GetEnemyInfo.
* @param $marine - also with all $marineX info from GetMarineInfo.

line.text: 'All marines have fell back. Mission aborted.'

line.comment: * We catch $leaderName before it gets destroyed.

line.text: ') - The ship has been sent home'

line.comment: * If this is a ship we first remove everything it contains, add the marines inventory, then put it back. If the cargo hold is full, at least the inventory won't be lost.
* @param $sender - 'leader', 'random', marine name or null. If null, displays as combat report.
